column4: i'm searching the forums, and seeing mention of grip, but it hasn't been updating since 05.  What's considered the best cd audio ripper?
wasn't aware k3b could rip.  i'm looking for a standalone gui
i guess i'll try grip. just curious if there's anything more current
One of the best audio ripping programs is "Exact Audio Copy", but you have to run it under Wine, so maybe it's not worth it in your case.
